author: sfgate.com
title: 'Beverly Hills, 90210,' then and now
text:
Photo: Fox Image 1 of / 40 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 40 Let's take a look back at the major players of "90210," then and now. 
Here's the the original main cast of Fox's "Beverly Hills, 90210." (Ian Ziering, Gabrielle Carteris, Jason Priestley, Shannon Doherty, Tori Spelling, Brian Austin Green, Jennie Garth and Luke Perry.) 
Photo: Fox Let's take a look back at the major players of "90210," then and... Image 2 of 40 Brenda Walsh (played by Shannen Doherty, seen here in 1992): Brenda and twin brother Brandon try to make their way in Beverly Hills after moving from Minnesota. She falls for Dylan Walsh, becomes besties with Kelly Taylor (until Kelly and Dylan fall for each other) and eventually leaves the zip code for the theater. 
Photo: Ron Galella, Getty Brenda Walsh (played by Shannen Doherty, seen here in 1992): Brenda... Image 3 of 40 Shannen Doherty in 2014.
Photo: Gary Gershoff, Getty Shannen Doherty in 2014. Image 4 of 40 Kelly Taylor (Jennie Garth, seen here in 1992). Taylor was the prettiest girl in school (she won that title in senior year), was Brenda's best friend for a bit, but Donna Martin's forever. She loved Dylan, then Brandon, then Dylan again. 
Photo: Ron Galella, Getty Kelly Taylor (Jennie Garth, seen here in 1992). Taylor was the... Image 5 of 40 Jennie Garth in 2015. 
Photo: Amanda Edwards, Getty Jennie Garth in 2015.  Image 6 of 40 Brandon Walsh (Jason Priestley in 1992). Brandon was the responsible twin (except that time Emily Valentine slipped him the Euphoria, but we digress), holding down a steady gig at the Peach Pit, working on the school paper, running for office and being the good friend to Dylan McKay (until Kelly gets between the two of them).
Photo: Kevin Winter, Getty Brandon Walsh (Jason Priestley in 1992). Brandon was the... Image 7 of 40 Jason Priestley in 2015. 
Photo: George Pimentel, Getty Jason Priestley in 2015.  Image 8 of 40 Donna Martin (played by Tori Spelling, seen here in 1992). Martin was the ditzy good girl of the show, the virgin-until-marriage (or seven seasons, whichever came first) and the reason "Donna Martin graduates!" resonates with people of a certain age. 
Photo: Kevin Winter, Getty Donna Martin (played by Tori Spelling, seen here in 1992). Martin... Image 9 of 40 Tori Spelling in 2015. 
Photo: Jason LaVeris, Getty Tori Spelling in 2015.  Image 10 of 40 Dylan McKay (played by Luke Perry, seen here in 1992). Dylan was the "90210" bad boy — rich, hot with a bit of a drug and alcohol problem. Brenda and Kelly both fell for him, but his supposed true love died when her car was hit by gunfire meant for Dylan. 
Photo: Ron Galella, Getty Dylan McKay (played by Luke Perry, seen here in 1992). Dylan was... Image 11 of 40 Luke Perry in 2015. 
Photo: Maarten De Boer, Getty Luke Perry in 2015.  Image 12 of 40 Steve Sanders (played by Ian Ziering, seen here in 1992). Steve was the jock, not that bright, but always up for a party. 
Photo: Ron Galella, Getty Steve Sanders (played by Ian Ziering, seen here in 1992). Steve was... Image 13 of 40 Ian Ziering (now of 'Sharknado' fame') in 2015. 
Photo: Astrid Stawiarz, Getty Ian Ziering (now of 'Sharknado' fame') in 2015.  Image 14 of 40 David Silver (Brian Austin Green in 1992). David was the dorky guy who finally got in with the cool kids of West Beverly High, eventually becoming Kelly Taylor's stepsister and dating Donna Martin (and marrying her).
Photo: Ron Galella, Getty David Silver (Brian Austin Green in 1992). David was the dorky guy... Image 15 of 40 Brian Austin Green in 2014.
Photo: Jason LaVeris, Getty Brian Austin Green in 2014. Image 16 of 40 Andrea Zuckerman (Gabrielle Carteris, seen here in 1992). Andrea was the straight-laced editor of the West Beverly High newspaper who harbored a major crush on Brandon Walsh. 
Photo: Ron Galella, Getty Andrea Zuckerman (Gabrielle Carteris, seen here in 1992). Andrea... Image 17 of 40 Gabrielle Carteris in 2015.
Photo: Allen Berezovsky, Getty Gabrielle Carteris in 2015. Image 18 of 40 Jason Priestley, Shannen Doherty, and Luke Perry in 1992. 
Photo: Ron Galella, Getty Jason Priestley, Shannen Doherty, and Luke Perry in 1992.  Image 19 of 40 Circa 1995, the cast of  'Beverly Hills, 90210.' Clockwise from bottom left: Brian Austin Green, Tiffani-Amber Thiessen, Luke Perry, Gabrielle Carteris, Mark Espinoza, Jason Priestley, Ian Ziering, Tori Spelling and Jennie Garth.
Photo: Fox Broadcasting, Getty Circa 1995, the cast of  'Beverly Hills, 90210.' Clockwise... Image 20 of 40 Jason Priestley, Tiffani-Amber Thiessen, Tori Spelling, Jennie Garth and Kathleen Robertson.
Photo: Jeff Kravitz, Getty Jason Priestley, Tiffani-Amber Thiessen, Tori Spelling, Jennie... Image 21 of 40 Valerie Malone (played by Tiffani Thiessen, seen here in 1994). Valerie ushered in a new era of '90210.' Brenda Walsh left town, Kelly left Dylan for Brandon and the show got a new wild child with the arrival of this character. 
Photo: File, FOX Valerie Malone (played by Tiffani Thiessen, seen here in 1994).... Image 22 of 40 Tiffani Thiessen in 2015.
Photo: JB Lacroix, Getty Tiffani Thiessen in 2015. Image 23 of 40 Antonia 'Toni' Marchette (played by Rebecca Gayheart, seen here in 1995). She played Dylan McKay's tragic love interest who mistakenly was killed by her mobster father after she and Dylan were married
Photo: Ron Galella, WireImage Antonia 'Toni' Marchette (played by Rebecca Gayheart, seen here in... Image 24 of 40 Rebecca Gayheart-Dane in 2015.
Photo: Jeffrey Mayer, Getty Rebecca Gayheart-Dane in 2015. Image 25 of 40 Actress Christine Elise played Brandon Walsh's on/off love interest, Emily Valentine. 
Photo: Kypros, Getty Actress Christine Elise played Brandon Walsh's on/off love... Image 26 of 40 Christine Elise in 2011.
Photo: Jeffrey Mayer, Getty Christine Elise in 2011. Image 27 of 40 Joe E. Tata, seen here with Jason Priestley, in 1992 played Nat Bussichio, better known as the owner of the Peach Pit dinner and surrogate father to the '90210' kids.
Photo: Ron Galella, Getty Joe E. Tata, seen here with Jason Priestley, in 1992 played Nat... Image 28 of 40 Actress Carol Potter played the Walsh twins mom Cindy Walsh. 
Photo: Ron Galella, Ltd., Getty Actress Carol Potter played the Walsh twins mom Cindy Walsh.  Image 29 of 40 Here are Joe E. Tata and Carol Potter in 2015. 
Photo: Bobby Bank, Getty Here are Joe E. Tata and Carol Potter in 2015.  Image 30 of 40 James Eckhouse was Jim Walsh, dad to Brandon and Brenda. 
Photo: Ron Galella, Getty James Eckhouse was Jim Walsh, dad to Brandon and Brenda.  Image 31 of 40 James Eckhouse in 2014. 
Photo: Walter McBride, Getty James Eckhouse in 2014.  Image 32 of 40 Let's not forget there was an Oscar winner in the "Beverly Hills, 90210" midst. Hilary Swank played Carly Reynolds in season eight of the show. She was a single mom who became romantically involved with Steve Sanders. 
Photo: Getty Images, Getty Let's not forget there was an Oscar winner in the "Beverly Hills,... Image 33 of 40 Hilary Swank in 2015.
Photo: Mathew Imaging, Getty Hilary Swank in 2015. Image 34 of 40 Vanessa Marcil became the '90210' resident bad girl when she took on the role of Gina Kincaid — Donna Martin's cousin, who was eventually revealed to be her sister. 
Photo: Sam Levi, Getty Vanessa Marcil became the '90210' resident bad girl when she took... Image 35 of 40 Vanessa Marcil in 2015. 
Photo: Paul Archuleta, Getty Vanessa Marcil in 2015.  Image 36 of 40 Clare Arnold (played by Kathleen Robertson, seen here in 1994). Clare lived with Donna and Kelly in the beach house during the college years, and dated David and Steve at different points. 
Photo: Time & Life Pictures, Getty Clare Arnold (played by Kathleen Robertson, seen here in 1994).... Image 37 of 40 Kathleen Roberts in 2015. 
Photo: Tibrina Hobson, Getty Kathleen Roberts in 2015.  Image 38 of 40 Ian Ziering, Gabrielle Carteris and Tori Spelling attend the WETv "Pet Project" To Raise Awareness For Canine Companions For Independence at Boulevard3 on May 7, 2015 in Hollywood, California. (Photo by Harmony Gerber/WireImage)
Photo: Harmony Gerber, Getty Ian Ziering, Gabrielle Carteris and Tori Spelling attend the WETv... Image 39 of 40 The cast of Lifetime's "The Unauthorized Beverly Hills, 90210."
The cast of Lifetime's "The Unauthorized Beverly Hills, 90210." Image 40 of 40 'Beverly Hills, 90210,' then and now 1  /  40 Back to Gallery The original "Beverly Hills, 90210" premiered on Oct. 4, 1990 on Fox (we're not going to comment on the 2008 reboot) and quickly became a huge teen sensation, launching the careers of the show's heartthrobs Luke Perry and Jason Priestley, and making Shannon Doherty, Jennie Garth and Tori Spelling major draws.
It also brought with it lots of rumors of hookups, catfights and jealously. 
All that good stuff gets addressed this weekend as the classic '90s show gets the Lifetime treatment. "The Unauthorized Beverly Hills, 90210 Story," premieres Oct. 3 at 8 p.m. and offers up lots of "unauthorized" backstage looks at the fights, sex and scandals of the teen soap. (You might remember when Lifetime did similar movies on "Saved by the Bell" and "Full House." )
Though the show lost popularity and pop-culture significance in its later years, it went on for 10 seasons, losing and gaining cast members along the way. 
Let's take a look back at the major players of "90210," then and now in the gallery above.
